Ingredients.Name: African Cuisine (North)
FlavorAffinities: cumin + garlic + mint, esp. Northeast Africa

Ingredients.Name: Allspice
Ingredients.Tips: Add early in cooking.

Ingredients.Name: Angelica
Ingredients.Tips: Add late in cooking; use in baking.

Ingredients.Name: Anise
Ingredients.Tips: Add early in cooking.

Ingredients.Name: Anise, Star
Ingredients.Tips: Add at the beginning of the cooking process. Use in stir-fries.
FlavorAffinities: star anise + milk + milk chocolate + orange zest + sugar
star anise + pork + soy sauce + sugar

Ingredients.Name: Appetizers
Ingredients.Tips: Saltiness stimulates appetite.

Ingredients.Name: Apples
FlavorAffinities: apples + almonds + Armagnac + crème fraîche + raisins
apples + caramel + cinnamon + dates + lemon confit + quince + ras el hanout + vanilla

Ingredients.Name: Apricots, Dried
FlavorAffinities: dried apricots + dried cherries + ginger + orange + pistachios

Ingredients.Name: Artichokes
FlavorAffinities: artichokes + garlic + lemon + olive oil + thyme
artichokes + olive oil + Parmesan cheese + white truffles

Ingredients.Name: Arugula
FlavorAffinities: arugula + balsamic vinegar + lemon + olive oil + Parmesan cheese

Ingredients.Name: Asian Cuisine
FlavorAffinities: asparagus + chervil + chives + garlic + morel mushrooms + shallots

Ingredients.Name: Asparagus, White
Ingredients.Tips: Covered to deprive it of sunlight while growing, white asparagus is lighter in flavor and texture than green asparagus.

white asparagus + lemon + cepes mushrooms + parsley
white asparagus + mustard + olive oil + vinegar

Ingredients.Name: Avocado Oil

FlavorAffinities: bacon + hard-boiled eggs + spinach + balsamic vinegar

Ingredients.Name: Balance
Ingredients.Tips: Seek balance in every dish you make:

Ingredients.Name: Bananas
Ingredients.Tips: Sugar enhances the flavor of bananas.
FlavorAffinities: banana + brown butter + caramel + citrus + peanuts
banana + cream + honey + macadamia nuts + vanilla

Ingredients.Name: Basil
Ingredients.Tips: Add just before serving.
FlavorAffinities: basil + garlic + olive oil + Parmesan cheese + pine nuts

Ingredients.Name: Basil, Thai
FlavorAffinities: Thai basil + beef + pumpkin seed oil

FlavorAffinities: short ribs + bay leaf + beer + mushrooms + mustard

Beets

Ingredients.Name: Bitter Dishes (E.G., Greens, Barbecue Food)
Ingredients.Tips: Salt suppresses bitterness.

Ingredients.Name: Bitterness
Ingredients.Function: cooling; stimulates appetite; promotes other tastes
Ingredients.Tips: Bitterness relieves thirst.

Ingredients.Name: Black-Eyed Peas
FlavorAffinities: black-eyed peas + collard greens + ham hocks

Ingredients.Name: Blueberries
Ingredients.Tips: Can substitute huckleberries.
FlavorAffinities: blueberries + cream + lemon zest + mascarpone + sugar

Ingredients.Tips: Use large flakes to make fish stock and small flakes to season dishes.

Ingredients.Name: Bouquet Garni
Ingredients.Tips: Bundle of herbs is removed after cooking.

Ingredients.Name: Braised Dishes
Ingredients.Tips: Check here for ideas of meats or vegetables to add to a braised dish.

Ingredients.Name: Brined Dishes
Ingredients.Tips: Brining meats (i.e., in salt water) before cooking increases their moistness, juiciness, and flavor.

FlavorAffinities: broccoli + anchovies + capers + red pepper flakes + garlic + olives

FlavorAffinities: broccoli rabe + anchovies + red pepper flakes + garlic + olive oil

FlavorAffinities: red cabbage + bacon + blue cheese + walnuts

Ingredients.Name: Calvados
Ingredients.Tips: Generally an after-dinner drink.

Ingredients.Name: Caraway Seeds
Ingredients.Tips: Add late in the cooking process.

Ingredients.Name: Cardamom
Ingredients.Tips: Add early when cooking.

Ingredients.Name: Caribbean Cuisines
FlavorAffinities: fish + allspice + oil + onions + vinegar (aka escabèche)

FlavorAffinities: cauliflower + anchovies + red pepper flakes + garlic + olive oil

Ingredients.Tips: Cayenne tastes hotter the more it cooks.

Ingredients.Name: Celery Root
Ingredients.Tips: Always peel before using.

Ingredients.Name: Chard (Aka Swiss Chard)
FlavorAffinities: chard + bell peppers + pecorino cheese + eggplant

FlavorAffinities: goat cheese + fennel seeds + orange zest + pasta

FlavorAffinities: mozzarella cheese + basil + olive oil + tomatoes

Ingredients.Name: Cherries — In General
FlavorAffinities: cherries + goat cheese + ice wine vinegar + black pepper + thyme
cherries + orange + sugar + dry red wine

Ingredients.Name: Chervil
Ingredients.Tips: Always use chervil fresh, not cooked.

Ingredients.Name: Chicken
FlavorAffinities: chicken + andouille sausage + red beans + rice
chicken + avocado + bacon + garlic + mayonnaise + tarragon

Ingredients.Name: Chile Peppers — In General

Ingredients.Name: Chile Peppers, Chipotle (Dried, Smoked Jalapeño Peppers)
Chives
Ingredients.Tips: Always use fresh, not cooked. Use in stir-fries.

Ingredients.Name: Cilantro
Ingredients.Tips: Always use fresh, not cooked — or, if you must, add at the very last minute.

Ingredients.Name: Cinnamon
Ingredients.Tips: Add early in cooking.

FlavorAffinities: clams + garlic + mussels + onion + thyme + white wine

FlavorAffinities: coconut + apricot + ginger + green tea + lemongrass + rice + vanilla

Ingredients.Name: Cod, Salt
FlavorAffinities: salt cod + bay leaf + thyme + white wine vinegar

Ingredients.Name: Coldness (Of Indoor Or Outdoor Temperature; See Also Winter)
Cooling
Ingredients.Function: Ingredients believed to have cooling properties; useful in hot weather.

Ingredients.Name: Coriander
Ingredients.Tips: Add near the end of cooking.

Ingredients.Name: Cumin
Ingredients.Tips: Add early in the cooking process.

Ingredients.Name: Curry Leaves
Ingredients.Tips: Add later in cooking, or to finish a dish.

Ingredients.Name: Curry Powder And Sauces
Ingredients.Tips: Add early in cooking process.

Ingredients.Name: Desserts
Ingredients.Tips: Sweetness satiates the appetite, so generally end a meal on a sweet note.

Ingredients.Name: Dill
Ingredients.Tips: Always use dill fresh, not cooked.

Ingredients.Name: Duck
FlavorAffinities: duck + apples + parsnips (and/or other root vegetables)
duck + cinnamon + honey + orange + star anise

Ingredients.Tips: Use to finish a dish.

Ingredients.Name: Freshness
Ingredients.Tips: Listed herbs are always used fresh (with little or no cooking), and add a note of freshness to a dish. Other listed flavors add a bright note to a dish. For the opposite, see listing for Slow-Cooked.

Ingredients.Name: Frisée (A Fine-Leaved Variety Of Curly Endive)
FlavorAffinities: frisée + bacon + Roquefort cheese + garlic + shallots + sherry vinegar

Ingredients.Name: Fruit, Dried
Ingredients.Tips: If the fruit is hard, steam before using.

Ingredients.Name: Fruit, Fresh
Ingredients.Tips: Sugar enhances the natural flavor of fruit.

Ingredients.Name: Fruit, Tropical
FlavorAffinities: tropical fruit + ginger + mint + orange + sugar

Ingredients.Name: Game — In General
Ingredients.Tips: The flavor of cloves adds richness to game.

Ingredients.Name: Garam Masala
Ingredients.Tips: Add near the end of the cooking process or before serving.
FlavorAffinities: cardamom + black pepper + cinnamon + cloves + coriander + cumin + dried chiles + fennel + mace + nutmeg

Ingredients.Name: Georgian Cuisine (Russian)
FlavorAffinities: coriander + dill + fenugreek (blue) + garlic + red peppers

Ingredients.Name: Gin
FlavorAffinities: gin + apple brandy + lemon juice + orange juice
gin + Earl Grey tea + lemon + sugar

FlavorAffinities: mustard greens + garlic + olive oil + prosciutto
mustard greens + sesame oil + soy sauce

FlavorAffinities: halibut + beets + blood orange + olive oil + sherry vinegar

Ingredients.Name: Herbes De Provence
FlavorAffinities: basil + fennel seeds + lavender + marjoram + rosemary + sage + summer savory + thyme

Ingredients.Name: Horseradish
Ingredients.Tips: Use horseradish raw or add at end of cooking process.

Indian Cuisine
Avoid: beef, for religious reasons, say some
pork, for religious reasons, say some

FlavorAffinities: cardamom + cinnamon + cloves + cumin + ginger + rose

Ingredients.Name: Kaffir Limes And Kaffir Lime Leaf
Kale

Ingredients.Name: Korean Cuisine
FlavorAffinities: chile peppers + sesame seeds + soy sauce

Ingredients.Tips: Cloves add richness to the flavor of lamb.
FlavorAffinities: lamb + cinnamon + dried apricots + preserved lemons + walnuts

Ingredients.Name: Latin American Cuisine
FlavorAffinities: meats + black beans + greens + orange + rice

Ingredients.Tips: Caraway seeds can substitute for lavender.

Ingredients.Name: Leeks
Ingredients.Tips: Add early in cooking process.

Ingredients.Name: Lemongrass
Ingredients.Tips: Add near end of cooking process; use in stir-fries.

Lettuces — Mesclun Greens (I.E., Mixed Baby Lettuces)
Lettuce, Romaine
FlavorAffinities: romaine + capers + garlic + Parmesan cheese + red onions

lime + caramel + cream cheese + macadamia nuts

Ingredients.Name: Liver, Calf’S

FlavorAffinities: calf’s liver + figs + onions + red wine vinegar

FlavorAffinities: chicken livers + bacon + balsamic vinegar + onions + rosemary

lobster + corn + garlic + lemon + potatoes + tarragon

FlavorAffinities: mâche + apples + beets + endive + sherry vinaigrette + walnuts

Ingredients.Name: Mangoes

Ingredients.Name: Maple Syrup
Avoid: sugar, dark brown, as it is too intense with maple syrup

Ingredients.Name: Marjoram
Ingredients.Tips: Add at the end of the cooking process.

Ingredients.Name: Meats
Ingredients.Tips: Enhance the flavor of meat before (e.g., via brining and marinating), during (e.g., via selecting the best cooking technique), and after cooking (e.g., via condiments and sauces).

Ingredients.Name: Menu
Ingredients.Tips: Strive for balance over an entire menu, i.e., appetizer, entrée, and dessert. Envision the course of a menu as a piece of music having a melody, rhythm, and tempo.

Ingredients.Name: Mint — In General
Ingredients.Tips: Mint generally refers to spearmint.

Ingredients.Name: Mint, Peppermint
Ingredients.Tips: Mint suggests “false coolness.”

Ingredients.Name: Mirepoix
Ingredients.Tips: Use as the base of stocks and soups.

Ingredients.Name: Miso And Miso Soup
Ingredients.Volume: quiet–moderate (depending on light or dark miso)

Ingredients.Name: Monkfish
FlavorAffinities: monkfish + white beans + fennel + garlic + saffron + tomatoes

Ingredients.Name: Moroccan Cuisine
FlavorAffinities: chile peppers + garlic + olive oil + salt (aka harissa)

Ingredients.Name: Mushrooms — Morels
FlavorAffinities: morels + garlic + lemon + olive oil + parsley

Ingredients.Name: Mushrooms — Portobello
Ingredients.Tips: Gets firmer with longer cooking.
FlavorAffinities: portobello mushrooms + lemon + mint + olive oil

Ingredients.Name: Mussels
FlavorAffinities: mussels + clams + garlic + onion + thyme + white wine

Ingredients.Name: Mustard
Ingredients.Tips: Add at the end of the cooking process.

Ingredients.Name: Nutmeg
Ingredients.Tips: Use in moderation.
FlavorAffinities: nutmeg + cloves + ginger + white pepper (quatre épices)

Ingredients.Name: Nuts — In General
Ingredients.Tips: Always toast nuts before using to enhance flavor and texture.

Ingredients.Name: Oil, Avocado
FlavorAffinities: avocado oil + chardonnay vinegar + tomato water

Ingredients.Name: Oil, Hazelnut
Ingredients.Tips: Avoid cooking, as it burns easily.

Ingredients.Name: Oil, Pumpkin Seed
Ingredients.Tips: Use to finish a dish, not to cook.

Ingredients.Name: Oil, Sesame
Ingredients.Tips: Add as a flavoring to raw or cooked dishes.
FlavorAffinities: sesame oil + ginger + mustard + rice wine vinegar

Ingredients.Name: Oil, Walnut
Ingredients.Tips: Avoid cooking as it burns easily.

Ingredients.Name: Onions — In General
Ingredients.Taste: pungent (+ sweet with cooking via caramelization)
Ingredients.Tips: Onions increase appetite, and go with virtually all savory foods.

Ingredients.Name: Onions, Sweet (E.G., Vidalia)
FlavorAffinities: Vidalia onions + goat cheese + tomatoes + sherry vinegar

Ingredients.Name: Oranges — In General
Ingredients.Tips: Lemon brightens the flavor of orange.

Ingredients.Name: Oregano
Ingredients.Tips: Oregano can have great variability, i.e., from mild to hot and spicy (e.g., Italian oregano is “quieter” than Greek oregano).

Ingredients.Name: Oysters
Ingredients.Weight: light–heavy (e.g., light Kumamotos to heavy Gulf Coast oysters)

Ingredients.Name: Paprika — In General
Ingredients.Taste: sweet–hot, depending on variety (e.g., hot, sweet, smoked, etc.)
Ingredients.Tips: Add at the beginning of the cooking process.

Ingredients.Name: Parsley
Ingredients.Tips: Use fresh. Parsley generally refers to flat-leaf parsley. Parsley is great for blending, as it is compatible with virtually all other herbs.

parsley + capers + garlic + lemon zest + olive oil
parsley + garlic + olive oil + Parmesan cheese + vinegar
parsley + lemon juice + olive oil + Parmesan cheese

passion fruit + dark chocolate + ginger + raspberries

FlavorAffinities: peas + celery + olive oil + onions + chicken stock + sugar

Ingredients.Name: Pepper, Black

Ingredients.Name: Pepper, Green (As Peppercorns)

Ingredients.Name: Pepper, Pink
Ingredients.Tips: Add at the end of the cooking process.

Ingredients.Tips: Add at the end of the cooking process.

Ingredients.Tips: Look for green plantains without any yellow.

Ingredients.Name: Rosemary
Ingredients.Tips: Add early in the cooking process.

salmon + miso + pineapple + tomato + white wine

Ingredients.Name: Salmon, Smoked
FlavorAffinities: smoked salmon + chives + crème fraîche + dill + pumpernickel-rye blini
smoked salmon + chives + dill + scrambled eggs + potatoes
smoked salmon + cream cheese + lemon juice + shallots + sour cream
smoked salmon + dill + horseradish + lemon juice + sour cream

Ingredients.Name: Saltiness
Ingredients.Function: heating; stimulates salivation; enhances the flavors of ingredients
Ingredients.Tips: Adding salt to a dish diminishes the effects of bitter, sour, and sweet.

Ingredients.Name: Sauerkraut
Ingredients.Tips: Sauerkraut is shredded cabbage that is fermented in salt and spices.

Ingredients.Name: Sauerkraut
Ingredients.Tips: Sauerkraut is shredded cabbage that is fermented in salt and spices.

Ingredients.Name: Savory
Ingredients.Volume: moderate–loud (Summer savory is quieter, winter savory is louder.)
Ingredients.Tips: Can stand up to cooking.

Ingredients.Name: Scallops
FlavorAffinities: scallops + basil + chicken stock + duck fat + garlic + lemon juice + tomatoes

Ingredients.Name: Scotch
FlavorAffinities: scotch + Earl Grey tea + tamarind syrup

Ingredients.Name: Seafood — In General
Ingredients.Tips: Tap these ideas when cooking a medley of assorted seafood.

Ingredients.Name: Sesame Seeds, Black
Ingredients.Tips: Use whole seeds.

Ingredients.Name: Sesame Seeds, White
Ingredients.Tips: Toast before using; use ground or whole.
FlavorAffinities: sesame seeds + honey + tahini paste + vanilla
sesame seeds + garlic + soy sauce + spinach

Ingredients.Name: Shallots
Ingredients.Tips: Shallots are milder than garlic or onions.

Ingredients.Name: Shrimp
FlavorAffinities: shrimp + cepes mushrooms + curry powder + Dijon mustard
shrimp + chiles + lime juice + brown sugar
shrimp + white beans + bell pepper + orange + sausage

Ingredients.Name: Slow-Cooked
Ingredients.Tips: These herbs and flavorings taste better with longer cooking.

Ingredients.Name: Smokiness
Ingredients.Tips: Add a smoky component to provide a “meaty” flavor to a dish or to counteract the richness of certain meats and seafoods.

Ingredients.Name: Sorrel
Ingredients.Tips: Always use fresh; as a soft-leaved herb, it will lose flavor in sauces, soups.

Ingredients.Name: Sour Cream
Ingredients.Tips: Use fresh, or cook at low temperatures only.

Ingredients.Name: Sourness
Ingredients.Tips: Sourness tends to sharpen other flavors.

Ingredients.Name: Southeast Asian Cuisines
Ingredients.Tips: Balance hot + sour + salty + sweet tastes.
FlavorAffinities: chile peppers + fish sauce + lime + sugar

Ingredients.Name: Soy Sauce
Ingredients.Tips: Add at the end of the cooking process, or to finish a dish. Use in stir-fries.

Ingredients.Name: Spanish Cuisine
FlavorAffinities: tomatoes + almonds + olive oil + roasted red peppers

Ingredients.Name: Spinach
FlavorAffinities: spinach + bacon + garlic + onions + cider vinegar
spinach + fennel + Parmesan cheese + portobello mushrooms + balsamic vinegar
spinach + feta cheese + lemon juice + oregano

Ingredients.Name: Spring
Techniques: pan roast and other stove-top methods

Ingredients.Name: Sprouts
Ingredients.Tips: Cook for less than 30 seconds, or they’ll wilt.

Ingredients.Name: Squash, Butternut
FlavorAffinities: butternut squash + anchovies + bread crumbs + onions + pasta
butternut squash + bacon + maple syrup + sage
butternut squash + crème fraîche + nutmeg + sage

Ingredients.Name: Squash, Winter
FlavorAffinities: winter squash + garlic + olive oil + parsley
winter squash + onions + Parmesan cheese + chicken stock

Ingredients.Name: Squid (Aka Calamari)
FlavorAffinities: squid + basil + bell peppers + chiles + garlic + orange + tomatoes + red wine

Ingredients.Name: Strawberries
Ingredients.Tips: Adding sugar enhances strawberry flavor, as does adding an acid such as citrus juice or vinegar.
FlavorAffinities: strawberries + almonds + olive oil + balsamic vinegar
strawberries + black pepper + ricotta cheese + red wine

Ingredients.Name: Sugar
Ingredients.Tips: Balance sweetness with acid (e.g., vinegar) and salt. Avoid dark brown sugar with maple syrup, as the combination is too intense.

Ingredients.Name: Sugar, Palm
Ingredients.Tips: Avoid with lighter dishes, which would be overwhelmed.

Ingredients.Name: Sumac
FlavorAffinities: sumac + salt + sesame seeds + thyme (aka Middle Eastern za’atar)

Ingredients.Name: Sunchokes
FlavorAffinities: beef + bay leaf + dill + nutmeg + onions
red wine + allspice + cinnamon + cloves + raisins + sugar

Ingredients.Name: Sweetbreads
FlavorAffinities: sweetbreads + hazelnuts + red wine vinegar + walnuts

Ingredients.Name: Sweetness
Ingredients.Tips: The colder the food or drink, the less the perception of sweetness. Sweetness tends to round out flavors, while acidity sharpens them.

Ingredients.Name: Sweet Potatoes
FlavorAffinities: sweet potatoes + chile peppers + lemon zest

Ingredients.Name: Szechuan Pepper
Ingredients.Tips: Add at the end of the cooking process.

Ingredients.Name: Tamarind
Ingredients.Tips: Add at the beginning of the cooking process.

Ingredients.Name: Tangerines (See Oranges, Mandarin) Tarragon
Ingredients.Tips: Add at the end of the cooking process.

Ingredients.Name: Tequila
FlavorAffinities: tequila + Cointreau + lime juice + pomegranate juice

Ingredients.Name: Tex-Mex Cuisine
Ingredients.Tips: Authentic Thai cuisine strives for a balance of hot + sour + salty + sweet.

Ingredients.Name: Thyme
Ingredients.Tips: Add at the beginning of the cooking process; use dried or fresh.

Ingredients.Name: Tomatoes
FlavorAffinities: tomatoes + basil + mozzarella cheese + garlic + olive oil + balsamic vinegar
tomatoes + basil + olive oil + orange juice + prosciutto + watermelon

FlavorAffinities: smoked trout + horseradish + lemon juice + olive oil + purslane

Ingredients.Name: Truffles, White (And White Truffle Oil)
Ingredients.Tips: Shave over dishes at the last minute.

tuna + black pepper + cilantro + cucumber + soy sauce
tuna + jalapeño chile + cilantro + ginger + sesame oil + shallots + soy sauce

FlavorAffinities: turmeric + cilantro + cumin + garlic + onion + paprika + parsley + pepper (Moroccan chermoula)

Ingredients.Name: Veal — Chop
FlavorAffinities: veal chop + celery root + cream + Dijon mustard

Ingredients.Name: Vegetables
Ingredients.Tips: Onion enhances the flavor of vegetables, and brings out their sweetness.

Ingredients.Name: Vegetarian Dishes
Ingredients.Tips: To add a deep, meaty flavor to vegetarian dishes — without adding meat — try:

Ingredients.Name: Venison
FlavorAffinities: venison + garlic + rosemary + tomatoes + red wine

Ingredients.Name: Verjus
Ingredients.Tips: Use instead of vinegar or lemon juice, or as a seasoning.

Ingredients.Name: Vinegar, Balsamic
Ingredients.Tips: Use when you want a sweet, low-acid vinegar.
FlavorAffinities: white balsamic vinegar + white truffle oil + whole grain mustard

Ingredients.Name: Vinegar, Banyuls
Ingredients.Tips: Can substitute for red wine vinegar. Use to deglaze a pan.

Ingredients.Name: Vinegar, Champagne
Ingredients.Tips: Champagne vinegar is the most delicate vinegar.

Ingredients.Name: Vinegar, Malt
Ingredients.Tips: Sprinkle on foods judiciously.

Ingredients.Name: Vinegar, Red Wine
Ingredients.Tips: Red wine vinegar can stand up to spices and stronger herbs.

Ingredients.Name: Vinegar, White Wine
Ingredients.Tips: Can substitute champagne vinegar if needed.

Ingredients.Name: Vodka
FlavorAffinities: vodka + beef consommé + celery leaf + horseradish
vodka + carrot juice + lemon thyme + lime

Ingredients.Name: Warming
Ingredients.Function: Ingredients believed to have warming properties; useful in cold weather.

FlavorAffinities: watercress + almonds + green apple + pecorino cheese

Ingredients.Name: Watermelon
FlavorAffinities: watermelon + fennel + lemon juice + parsley + salt
